original: saṃmūrchitaḥ kusumahāsiṣu mallikānāṃ gulmeṣu vārikaṇakaṇṭakito nabhasvān /
analyzed: saṃmūrchitaḥ kusuma hā asiṣu mallikānām gulmeṣu vāri kaṇa kaṇṭakitaḥ nabhasvān

original: saṃtāpayaty anupaśāntavikalparāgaṃ ceto narasya sutarām aparīkṣakasya // GoṚp_33 //
analyzed: saṃtāpayati an upaśānta vikalpa rāgam cetaḥ narasya sutarām aparīkṣakasya

original: sūkṣmāṇi saṃdhigahanāny api cāvagāhya svapratyayā bahuvidhāni matāntarāṇi /
analyzed: sūkṣmāṇi saṃdhi gahanāni api ca avagāhya sva pratyayāḥ bahuvidhāni mata antarāṇi

original: medhāvino 'pi nanu rāgapiśācavaśyāḥ saṃprāpnuvanti paramaṃ smṛtivipralopam // GoṚp_34 //
analyzed: medhāvinaḥ pi nanu rāga piśāca vaśyāḥ saṃprāpnuvanti paramam smṛti vipralopam

original: hatvāpi rāgaviṣabījavijṛṃbhitāni svabhyastayogapadavīsthirabuddhayo 'pi /
analyzed: hatvā api rāga viṣa bīja vijṛṃbhitāni su abhyasta yoga padavī sthira buddhayaḥ pi

original: yoṣinmukhāny alakapallavitāny udīkṣya bhraṣṭā bhavanti tapasaḥ paśubhiḥ samānāḥ // GoṚp_35 //
analyzed: yoṣit mukhāni alaka pallavitāni udīkṣya bhraṣṭāḥ bhavanti tapasaḥ paśubhiḥ samānāḥ

original: dṛṅmārgaheyam avahatya balaṃ malānām ekāvaśiṣṭabhavabandhanatantavo 'pi /
analyzed: dṛś mārga heyam avahatya balam malānām eka avaśiṣṭa bhava bandhana tantavaḥ pi

original: āryā manaḥsthitibhidānugatāḥ smareṇa lajjālavo 'py anubhavanti daśām anāryām // GoṚp_36 //
analyzed: āryāḥ manaḥ sthiti bhidā anugatāḥ smareṇa anubhavanti daśām anāryām

original: uccaiḥ śiro vahati tāvad ayaṃ prajāsu yāvan na kāmakalidurlalitāny upāste /
analyzed: uccais śiraḥ vahati tāvat ayam prajāsu yāvat na kāma kali durlalitāni upāste

original: āliṅgitaś ca puruṣo madanajvareṇa śvā saṃkaṭasthita iva prakhalīkṛtaś ca // GoṚp_37 //
analyzed: āliṅgitaḥ ca puruṣaḥ madana jvareṇa śvā saṃkaṭa sthitaḥ iva prakhalīkṛtaḥ ca

original: api ca bhadramukhāḥ
analyzed: api ca bhadra mukhāḥ

original: kaṇṭhopāntavirodhagadgadataraṃ kūjañ chanaiḥ pṛṣṭhato
analyzed: kaṇṭha upānta virodha gadgadataram kūjam chanais pṛṣṭhatas

original: rāgād raktatarekṣaṇaḥ sacakitaṃ nirbhartsyamāno muhuḥ /
analyzed: rāgāt raktatara īkṣaṇaḥ sa cakitam nirbhartsyamānaḥ muhur

original: śyenāyātam asaṃpradhārya dayitām anveti pārāvato
analyzed: śyenāyātam a saṃpradhārya dayitām anveti

original: rāgābhyāsakalaṅkitasya manasaḥ kā vañcanā dūrataḥ // GoṚp_38 //
analyzed: rāga abhyāsa kalaṅkitasya manasaḥ kā vañcanā dūratas

original: ye naikāṅgulitarjanām api guroḥ soḍhuṃ samarthā narāḥ
analyzed: ye nā eka aṅguli tarjanām api guroḥ soḍhum samarthāḥ narāḥ

original: mānātyunnatamānasāś ca sakalaṃ paśyanty adhastāj jagat /
analyzed: māna ati unnata mānasāḥ ca sakalam paśyanti adhastāt jagat

original: te rāgena kadarthitā dhṛtibhidā pādair hatā yoṣitām
analyzed: te rāgena kadarthitāḥ dhṛti bhidā pādaiḥ hatāḥ yoṣitām

original: ājñā mūrdhabhir udvahanti kṛpaṇā mālām ivāmlāyinīm // GoṚp_39 //
analyzed: ājñāḥ mūrdhabhiḥ udvahanti kṛpaṇāḥ mālām iva a mlāyinīm

original: jitvārātīn samaravijayakhyātaśauryāvalepān
analyzed: jitvā arātīn samara vijaya khyāta śaurya avalepān

original: āyāminyo jagati vitatāḥ kīrtayo yaiḥ samantāt /
analyzed: āyāminyaḥ jagati vitatāḥ kīrtayaḥ yaiḥ samantāt

original: bhinnās te 'pi prakṛticapalair aṅganāvākyabāṇair
analyzed: bhinnāḥ te pi prakṛti capalaiḥ aṅganā vākya bāṇaiḥ

original: nirmaryādāḥ punar ayaśasā jīvalokaṃ sphuranti // GoṚp_40 //
analyzed: nirmaryādāḥ punar ayaśasā jīva lokam sphuranti

original: paricitam api śrutvā vādyadhvaniṃ rajanīkṣaye
analyzed: paricitam api śrutvā vādya dhvanim rajanī kṣaye

original: bhavati sahasā yāsāṃ trāso gṛheṣu savepathuḥ /
analyzed: bhavati sahasā yāsām trāsaḥ gṛheṣu sa vepathuḥ

original: madanavihatās tā gacchanti kṣapāsv abhisārikā
analyzed: madana vihatāḥ tāḥ gacchanti kṣapāsu abhisārikā

original: bahalatimiracchannān deśāñ chivārutabhīṣaṇān // GoṚp_41 //
analyzed: bahala timira channān deśān chivā ruta bhīṣaṇān

original: mandaṃ mandaṃ salīlaṃ sakusumanikare harmyapṛṣthe vivikte
analyzed: mandam mandam sa līlam sa kusuma nikare harmya pṛṣthe vivikte

original: khidyante saṃcarantyaḥ priyavidhṛtakarāmbhoruhā yās taruṇyaḥ /
analyzed: khidyante saṃcarantyaḥ priya vidhṛta kara ambhoruhāḥ yāḥ taruṇyaḥ

original: rāgāveśāvatantrā bahumahiṣakhurakṣuṇṇapaṅkāṅkadurgān
analyzed: rāga āveśa avatantrāḥ bahu mahiṣa khura kṣuṇṇa paṅka aṅka durgān

original: mārgān prāvṛḍniśāsu drutapadarabhasaṃ tā vyatikramya yānti // GoṚp_42 //
analyzed: mārgān prāvṛṣ niśāsu druta pada rabhasam tāḥ vyatikramya yānti

original: vepante navavāricūrṇaśiśiraiḥ spṛṣṭāḥ kadambānilair
analyzed: vepante nava vāri cūrṇa śiśiraiḥ spṛṣṭāḥ kadamba anilaiḥ

original: bālā jālagavākṣapakṣavisṛtair yā ramyaharmyāśritāḥ /
analyzed: bālāḥ jāla gavākṣa pakṣa visṛtaiḥ yāḥ ramya harmya āśritāḥ

original: dhārāpātaviśīrṇapuṣparacanāḥ sāraṅgaparyākulās
analyzed: dhārā pāta viśīrṇa puṣpa racanāḥ sāraṅga paryākulāḥ

original: tā paṅkāṅkitamūkanūpuraravā rātrau vrajanty adhvanā // GoṚp_43 //
analyzed: tā paṅka aṅkita mūka nūpura ravāḥ rātrau vrajanti adhvanā

original: śastrāpātā kuvalayadalasparśakalpā bhavanti
analyzed: śastra āpātā kuvalaya dala sparśa kalpāḥ bhavanti

original: jvālāś cāgner gataghanaśaraccandrikāśleṣaśītāḥ /
analyzed: jvālāḥ ca agneḥ gata ghana śarad candrikā āśleṣa śītāḥ

original: kāmān prāpya śvasanacapalā mūrtayaḥ pannagānāṃ
analyzed: kāmān prāpya śvasana capalāḥ mūrtayaḥ pannagānām

original: sāmyaṃ yānti bhramaravirutair dāmabhir mālatīnām // GoṚp_44 //
analyzed: sāmyam yānti bhramara virutaiḥ dāmabhiḥ mālatīnām

original: sarvāyatanonmāthī tasmād rāgo mahad duḥkham ity ukte bhujago 'bravīt /
analyzed: sarva āyatana unmāthī tasmāt rāgaḥ mahat duḥkham iti ukte bhujagaḥ bravīt

original: nanu khalu duḥkham rāgaś cittaviparyāsakṛd durācāraḥ /
analyzed: nanu khalu duḥkham rāgaḥ citta viparyāsa kṛt durācāraḥ

original: krodhaṃ tu duḥkhataram ity avaimi cetojvalaṃ tu mūlam / kutaḥ
analyzed: krodham tu duḥkhataram iti avaimi cetaḥ jvalam tu mūlam kutas

original: vikṣiptāmbudasāndracandrakiraṇaprakṣālitāṭṭālake
analyzed: vikṣipta ambuda sāndra candra kiraṇa prakṣālita aṭṭālake

original: vīṇāveṇuravānubaddhamadhurastrīgitaramye gṛhe /
analyzed: vīṇā veṇu rava anubaddha madhura strī gita ramye gṛhe

original: viddhaḥ krodhaśilīmukhena puruṣo nāpnoti nidrāṃ yataḥ
analyzed: viddhaḥ krodha śilīmukhena puruṣaḥ nā āpnoti nidrām yatas

original: krodhād duḥkhataraṃ na duḥkham aparaṃ kiṃ cit tato vidyate // GoṚp_45 //
analyzed: krodhāt duḥkhataram na duḥkham aparam kim cit tatas vidyate

original: yogābhyāsaviśeṣaśāntamatibhir vāyvambumūlāśanair
analyzed: yoga abhyāsa viśeṣa śānta matibhiḥ vāyu ambu mūla aśanaiḥ

original: viśrambhāyatanatvam abhyupagataiḥ prāyas tiraścām api /
analyzed: viśrambha āyatana tvam abhyupagataiḥ prāyas tiraścām api

original: dagdhāḥ krodhahutāśanair janapadāḥ krūrair ivāśīviṣair
analyzed: dagdhāḥ krodha hutāśanaiḥ janapadāḥ krūraiḥ iva āśīviṣaiḥ

original: yan mohād ṛṣibhir na duḥkham aparaṃ krodhāt tato vidyate // GoṚp_46 //
analyzed: yat mohāt ṛṣibhiḥ na duḥkham aparam krodhāt tatas vidyate

original: trāsāyāsaviśeṣalolanayanastrībāṣpaparyākulaṃ
analyzed: trāsa āyāsa viśeṣa lola nayana strī bāṣpa paryākulam

original: bālaiś ca stanacūcukārpitamukhaiḥ sāvegam unnāditam /
analyzed: bālaiḥ ca stana cūcuka arpita mukhaiḥ sa āvegam unnāditam

original: saṃrambhasphuritekṣaṇatrayaśikhijvālāpiśaṅgānano
analyzed: saṃrambha sphurita īkṣaṇa traya śikhi jvālā piśaṅga ānanaḥ

original: rudro yat tripuram dadāha vighṛṇaḥ krodhasya tad vaikṛtam // GoṚp_47 //
analyzed: rudraḥ yat tripuram dadāha vighṛṇaḥ krodhasya tat vaikṛtam

original: tīvrātaṅkavilolamūlavalayā naivāñjalipragrahāḥ
analyzed: tīvra ātaṅka vilola mūla valayāḥ na eva añjali pragrahāḥ

original: strīṇāṃ bāṣpakaṇāḥ karālataralā no pakṣmalā dṛṣṭayaḥ /
analyzed: strīṇām bāṣpa kaṇāḥ karāla taralāḥ no pakṣmalāḥ dṛṣṭayaḥ

original: kurvanty āvaraṇaṃ lalāṭapaṭalavyāvartamānabhruvāṃ
analyzed: kurvanti āvaraṇam lalāṭa paṭala vyāvartamāna bhruvām

original: rājñāṃ krodhaviṣāśivasya manasaḥ kiṃ nāma duḥkhaṃ tataḥ // GoṚp_48 //
analyzed: rājñām krodha viṣa aśivasya manasaḥ kim nāma duḥkham tatas

original: garbhādhāraṇayantraṇām avigaṇayyāpāyikāṃ mātaraṃ
analyzed: garbhādhāraṇa yantraṇām a vigaṇayya apāyikām mātaram

original: satkārātiśayakṣamaṃ ca pitaraṃ snehadravādhyāśayam /
analyzed: satkāra atiśaya kṣamam ca pitaram sneha drava adhyāśayam

original: yad viśrambhaniratyayāṃś ca suhṛdo ghnanti kṣatādhyāśayāḥ
analyzed: yat viśrambha niratyayān ca suhṛdaḥ ghnanti kṣata adhyāśayāḥ

original: krodhasyaiva vipākadāruṇatarās tā vṛttayaḥ sādhavaḥ // GoṚp_49 //
analyzed: krodhasya eva vipāka dāruṇatarāḥ tāḥ vṛttayaḥ sādhavaḥ

original: utpadyante paramamatayaḥ śuddhaye ye prajānāṃ
analyzed: utpadyante parama matayaḥ śuddhaye ye prajānām

original: duḥśodhānām avikalamalālīḍhagūḍhāśayānām /
analyzed: duḥśodhānām avikala mala ālīḍha gūḍha āśayānām

original: tān apy āryān parahitasukhaprakriyāmātrahāryān
analyzed: tān api āryān para hita sukha prakriyā mātra hāryān

original: krodhāviṣṭā vacanaviśikhaiḥ saṃmukhaṃ ghnanty anāryāḥ // GoṚp_50 //
analyzed: krodha āviṣṭāḥ vacana viśikhaiḥ saṃmukham ghnanti anāryāḥ

original: krodhāghrāto bhavati puruṣo dagdhalāvaṇyavaktro
analyzed: krodha āghrātaḥ bhavati puruṣaḥ dagdha lāvaṇya vaktraḥ

original: jvālācakrakrakacakalilān krodhano yāty apāyān /
analyzed: jvālā cakra krakaca kalilān krodhanaḥ yāti apāyān

original: tebhyo bhraṣṭo bhavati jagato locanātaṅkabhūtaḥ
analyzed: tebhyaḥ bhraṣṭaḥ bhavati jagataḥ locana ātaṅka bhūtaḥ

original: śrīvidveṣo na ripur aparaḥ krodhatulyo 'sti yasmāt // GoṚp_51 //
analyzed: śrī vidveṣaḥ na ripuḥ aparaḥ krodha tulyaḥ sti yasmāt

original: yasmin rakto bhavati puruṣas tatra kuryāt priyāṇi
analyzed: yasmin raktaḥ bhavati puruṣaḥ tatra kuryāt priyāṇi

original: dviṣṭo yasmai tadadhikatarāṇy apriyāṇy eva dhatte /
analyzed: dviṣṭaḥ yasmai tad adhikatarāṇi apriyāṇi eva dhatte

original: alpāvadye 'vigatarajasā tena roṣaḥ praviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: alpa avadye vigata rajasā tena roṣaḥ praviṣṭaḥ

original: krodhaṃ krodhopaśamakuśalā vadyayoniṃ vadanti // GoṚp_52 //
analyzed: krodham krodha upaśama kuśalāḥ vadya yonim vadanti

original: trāsotphullamukhīṃ mṛgīm iva vane lajjālasabhrūlatāṃ
analyzed: trāsa utphulla mukhīm mṛgīm iva vane lajjā alasa bhrū latām

original: saṃrambhāpahṛtottarīyavasanāṃ vicchinnakaṇṭheguṇām /
analyzed: saṃrambha apahṛta uttarīya vasanām vicchinna kaṇṭheguṇām

original: cikleśa pracurāṅganām iva satīṃ duḥśāsano draupadīṃ
analyzed: cikleśa pracura aṅganām iva satīm duḥśāsanaḥ draupadīm

original: sphīte yat sadasi prakāmacapalāḥ krodhasya tā vipluṣaḥ // GoṚp_53 //
analyzed: sphīte yat sadasi prakāma capalāḥ krodhasya tāḥ vipluṣaḥ

original: śāntātmā vijane vane prativasan nikṣiptadaṇḍo 'pi san
analyzed: śānta ātmā vijane vane prativasan nikṣipta daṇḍaḥ san

original: lokānām animittapeśalarasaḥ snehārthakārī suhṛt /
analyzed: lokānām animitta peśala rasaḥ sneha artha kārī suhṛd

original: khaḍgenārdra iva drumaḥ śakalito yat kṣāntivādī munī
analyzed: khaḍgena ārdraḥ iva drumaḥ śakalitaḥ yat kṣānti vādī munī

original: rājñā durjanavallabhasya nikaṣaṃ krodhasya tat prāhṛtam // GoṚp_54 //
analyzed: rājñā durjana vallabhasya nikaṣam krodhasya tat prāhṛtam

original: anekādīnavamayo vinipātī manojvalaḥ /
ity evaṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ krodhārir dhuri vartate // GoṚp_55 //
analyzed: iti evam sarva duḥkhānām krodha ariḥ dhuri vartate

original: mṛgo 'bravīt /
analyzed: mṛgaḥ bravīt

original: samyag vaktum etad bhujagapate krodhavaiśasaṃ tīvram /
analyzed: samyak vaktum etat bhujaga pate krodha vaiśasam tīvram

original: maraṇabhayād adhikataraṃ duḥkham ahaṃ nāvagacchāmi / kutaḥ
analyzed: maraṇa bhayāt adhikataram duḥkham aham na avagacchāmi kutas

original: maraṇopanipātakātarāṇāṃ kamanīyāny api mārabandhanāni /
analyzed: maraṇa upanipāta kātarāṇām kamanīyāni api māra bandhanāni

original: na mano ramayanti yaj janānāṃ na &9169; -
analyzed: na manaḥ ramayanti yat janānām na

original: duḥkham ataḥ paraṃ paraimi // GoṚp_56 //
analyzed: duḥkham atas param paraimi

original: suhṛdāṃ vadanāni vīkṣamāṇo ghanabāṣpāmbutaraṅgadurdināni /
analyzed: suhṛdām vadanāni vīkṣamāṇaḥ ghana bāṣpa ambu taraṅga durdināni

original: labhate vyasanaṃ yad antakāle na tato duḥkham avaimi kaṣṭam anyat // GoṚp_57 //
analyzed: labhate vyasanam yat antakāle na tatas duḥkham avaimi kaṣṭam anyat

original: pavanair avidheyaduḥkhaśīlaiḥ karapatrair iva pāṭyamānadehāḥ /
analyzed: pavanaiḥ avidheya duḥkha śīlaiḥ kara patraiḥ iva pāṭyamāna dehāḥ

original: paralokamahāprapātaśaṅkāḥ kṛpaṇā duḥkham avāpnuvanti tīvram // GoṚp_58 //
analyzed: para loka mahā prapāta śaṅkāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ duḥkham avāpnuvanti tīvram

original: paripāṇḍukapolamaṇḍalāni śvasanamlānavipāṭalādharāṇi /
analyzed: paripāṇḍu kapola maṇḍalāni śvasana mlāna vipāṭala adharāṇi

original: dayitāvadanāni nānukampāṃ janayanty antakadantavikṣatānām // GoṚp_59 //
analyzed: dayitā vadanāni nā anukampām janayanti antaka danta vikṣatānām

original: jananī malapaṅkadigdhaveṇī sutaviśrambhaniratyayopacārā /
analyzed: jananī mala paṅka digdha veṇī suta viśrambha niratyaya upacārā

original: upamṛtyum udīkṣya śokapaṅke vinimajjaty aparāyaṇā rudantī // GoṚp_60 //
analyzed: upamṛtyum udīkṣya śoka paṅke vinimajjati aparāyaṇā rudantī

original: calatāṃ tṛṇaparṇapallavānāṃ dhvanim ākarṇya vane mṛgā vasantaḥ /
analyzed: calatām tṛṇa parṇa pallavānām dhvanim ākarṇya vane mṛgāḥ vasantaḥ

original: anapekṣya parasparaṃ dravāmaḥ svasutān apy avadhūya mṛtyubhītāḥ // GoṚp_61 //
analyzed: an apekṣya parasparam dravāmaḥ sva sutān api avadhūya mṛtyu bhītāḥ

original: kaṭhinopalaśarkarākarāleṣv analapluṣṭatṛṇācaladrumeṣu /
analyzed: kaṭhina upala śarkarā karāleṣu anala pluṣṭa tṛṇa acala drumeṣu

original: maraṇāśanisaṃnipātabhītāḥ giridurgeṣv aparāyaṇā vasāmaḥ // GoṚp_62 //
analyzed: maraṇa aśani saṃnipāta bhītāḥ giri durgeṣu aparāyaṇāḥ vasāmaḥ

original: rajasāpi virūkṣitātmabhāvāḥ paruṣaiś copahatā gadaprahāraiḥ /
analyzed: rajasā api virūkṣita ātmabhāvāḥ paruṣaiḥ ca upahatāḥ gada prahāraiḥ

original: mahatīm api yātanāṃ vahante vacanatrāsajaḍā bhavanti mṛtyoḥ // GoṚp_63 //
analyzed: mahatīm api yātanām vahante vacana trāsa jaḍāḥ bhavanti mṛtyoḥ

original: hariṇo hariṇeva bandhumadhyād abhibhūya prasabhaṃ vikṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: hariṇaḥ hariṇā iva bandhu madhyāt abhibhūya prasabham vikṛṣyamāṇaḥ

original: avikhaṇḍitapauruṣeṇa mṛtyudviṣatā duḥkham ayaṃ paraiti lokaḥ // GoṚp_64 //
analyzed: a vikhaṇḍita pauruṣeṇa mṛtyu dviṣatā duḥkham ayam paraiti lokaḥ

analyzed: atha te puruṣāḥ tena tasya adbhutena abhiprasārita mānasāḥ sutarām tad viyoga śaṅkā vyathita hṛdayā

analyzed: viṣāda dainya vidheyāḥ cintā viṣaya atīta gocaram aviṣahyam ati vismayanīyam ca tat karma

analyzed: evaṃvidhasya vyasanāni dṛṣṭvā suhṛd viśeṣasya su durlabhasya

analyzed: prāṇaiḥ dhanaiḥ vā kim iha asti kṛtyam tat sāhasāt vāraya dhīra cetaḥ

analyzed: śoka anivṛttiḥ tu niṣprayojanam āśrayam saṃtāpayati kṛtyam antarayati kāntim ācchinatti pratibhānam āyāsayati āsanna sneha duḥkham suhṛd janam

analyzed: kaṇṭaka pracaya karkaśāni api janma durgāṇi prāyeṇa akṣatāḥ saṃcaranti puṇya balinaḥ

original: pracurajanamanovikāriṇīm anantaduḥkhabāṇasaṃnipātadūṣitām āyāsinīm iha paratra ca
analyzed: pracura jana manaḥ vikāriṇīm ananta duḥkha bāṇa saṃnipāta dūṣitām āyāsinīm iha paratra ca

analyzed: bāliśānām prati kṣaṇa vyaya anubandhāt dūṣitām aneka rūpa vaira kṛta anuṣaṅga dāruṇām bhava bhoga mayīm

original: aśivām akhilāṃ viparītasukhābhiniveśakhalāṃ saṃpattisaṃjñāntaritāṃ vipattim akāraṇabhraṃśamanovidāhinīm

original: ity alam iti prasaṅgenātipatati /
analyzed: iti alam iti prasaṅgena atipatati

original: nivāryamāṇo 'pi śataiḥ suhṛdbhir bāṣpāmbuvisyandivilocanāntaiḥ /
analyzed: nivāryamāṇaḥ pi śataiḥ suhṛdbhiḥ bāṣpa ambu visyandi vilocana antaiḥ

analyzed: sādhuḥ sva deha āśrayaṇīm apekṣām tatyāja loka vyasana upataptaḥ

original: ārtasvarair aviratair avibhaktavarṇais teṣāṃ viṣādapariluptamanaḥsthitīnām /
analyzed: ārta svaraiḥ avirataiḥ avibhakta varṇaiḥ teṣām viṣāda parilupta manaḥ sthitīnām

original: āpūryamāṇasalilapradarāntarālaḥ saṃcukṣubhe bhṛśataraṃ lavaṇāmburāśiḥ // GoSv_50 //
analyzed: āpūryamāṇa salila pradara antarālaḥ saṃcukṣubhe bhṛśataram lavaṇa amburāśiḥ

original: bodhisattvo 'pi mahāsattva iti praṇidhim upabṛmhayām āsa śāntaye sarvasattvānām /
analyzed: bodhisattvaḥ pi mahāsattvaḥ iti praṇidhim upabṛmhayām āsa śāntaye sarva sattvānām

original: divyā tāvat prakṛticapalā sopasargā vibhūtiḥ
analyzed: divyā tāvat prakṛti capalā sa upasargā vibhūtiḥ

original: prāg evānyā parimitasukhapratyayapratyapāyā /
analyzed: prāk eva anyā parimita sukha pratyaya pratyapāyā

original: tasmān nārtho mama &9169; &9169;
analyzed: tasmāt na arthaḥ mama

original: sukhaiḥ svapnamāyopamānaiḥ
analyzed: sukhaiḥ svapna māyā upamānaiḥ

original: puṇyād asmān na ca śamasukhaṃ prārthaye projjhya lokān // GoSv_51 //
analyzed: puṇyāt asmāt na ca śama sukham prārthaye projjhya lokān

original: mohāvarte maraṇamakare mānapāṣāṇagarbhe
analyzed: moha āvarte maraṇa makare māna pāṣāṇa garbhe

original: tṛṣṇātoye madanakaluṣe krodhasaṃsarpisarpe /
analyzed: tṛṣṇā toye madana kaluṣe krodha saṃsarpi sarpe

original: magnaṃ lokaṃ bhavajalanidhau śokavātāvadhūte
analyzed: magnam lokam bhava jalanidhau śoka vāta avadhūte

original: puṇyād asmād aham aśaraṇaṃ kṛtsnam uttārayeyam // GoSv_52 //
analyzed: puṇyāt asmāt aham aśaraṇam kṛtsnam uttārayeyam

original: evaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhim acalaṃ sādrisārasthirātmā
analyzed: evam kṛtvā praṇidhim acalam sa adrisāra sthira ātmā

original: anye tu klamaśithilāśrayā rujānām ājagmur nilayanatāṃ prabandhinīnām // GoŚv_8 //
analyzed: anye tu klama śithila āśrayāḥ rujānām ājagmuḥ nilayana tām prabandhinīnām

original: ke cil lālāsalilavisaraklinnasaṃsaktadīrgha-
analyzed: ke cit lālā salila visara klinna saṃsakta dīrgha

original: śmaśruvrātāḥ pathiṣu kṛpaṇāḥ klāntakāyāḥ śayānāḥ /
analyzed: śmaśru vrātāḥ pathiṣu kṛpaṇāḥ klānta kāyāḥ śayānāḥ

original: krūrārāvaiḥ purabalibhujāṃ maṇḍalaiḥ saṃpatadbhir
analyzed: krūra ārāvaiḥ pura balibhujām maṇḍalaiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ

original: vyāvṛttāsyā vipadam avaśāḥ pratyapadyanta tīvrām // GoŚv_9 //
analyzed: vyāvṛtta āsyāḥ vipadam avaśāḥ pratyapadyanta tīvrām

original: tasya tad atidāruṇam ālokya lokavyasanaṃ mahat kāruṇyam udapādi /
analyzed: tasya tat ati dāruṇam ālokya loka vyasanam mahat kāruṇyam udapādi

original: atha sa mahāsattvas tena sattvopadraveṇa vyathitamanāḥ sutarām abhivardhitānukampākampitaḥ pitevaikaputravyasanam asahamānaś cintām apede //
analyzed: atha sa mahāsattvaḥ tena sattva upadraveṇa vyathita manāḥ sutarām abhivardhita anukampā kampitaḥ pitā iva eka putra vyasanam a sahamānaḥ cintām apede

original: itthaṃ gatānāṃ ka ivābhyupāyaḥ syād āmayocchittisukhaḥ prajānām /
analyzed: ittham gatānām kaḥ iva abhyupāyaḥ syāt āmaya ucchitti sukhaḥ prajānām

original: apīha lokatrayabāndhavānāṃ tathāgatānām anṛṇo bhaveyam // GoŚv_10 //
analyzed: api iha lokatraya bāndhavānām tathāgatānām anṛṇaḥ bhaveyam

original: api nāma bhaven mama pratijñā sakalā lokahitaprayogasiddhyai /
analyzed: api nāma bhavet mama pratijñā sakalā loka hita prayoga siddhyai

original: api mānuṣajanmaduḥkhabhājo vyasanebhyaḥ parimokṣam aśnuvīran // GoŚv_11 //
analyzed: api mānuṣa janma duḥkha bhājaḥ vyasanebhyaḥ parimokṣam aśnuvīran

original: api nāma na bodhisattvanāmavyapadeśaṃ vitathaṃ samudvaheyam /
analyzed: api nāma na bodhisattva nāma vyapadeśam vitatham samudvaheyam

original: api sarvavidām agarhaṇīyāṃ dadhad ājñām animittavatsalānām // GoŚv_12 //
analyzed: api sarva vidām agarhaṇīyām dadhat ājñām animitta vatsalānām

original: bhavaduḥkhaśilīmukhakṣatānām api mateva piteva ca prajānām /
analyzed: bhava duḥkha śilīmukha kṣatānām api matā iva pitā iva ca prajānām

original: aham eva parāyaṇaṃ paraṃ syāṃ bhavaduḥkhāmburayapratīrabhūtaḥ // GoŚv_13 //
analyzed: aham eva parāyaṇam param syām bhava duḥkha ambu raya pratīra bhūtaḥ

original: yāvad duḥkhābhibhūtaḥ praviśati na jano rogadaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ
analyzed: yāvat duḥkha abhibhūtaḥ praviśati na janaḥ roga daṃṣṭrā karālam

original: kālāher āsyakośaṃ sakalajagadanugrāsasaṃbhogabhīmam /
analyzed: kālāheḥ āsya kośam sakala jagat anugrāsa saṃbhoga bhīmam

original: tāvad dvandvānurāgaṃ tridaśapurapatiśrīsukhaṃ projjhya ramyaṃ
analyzed: tāvat dvandva anurāgam tridaśa purapati śrī sukham projjhya ramyam

original: prāṇatyāgānurāgaṃ praṇayasukhakaraṃ bhūtabhṛtyai karomi // GoŚv_14 //
analyzed: prāṇatyāga anurāgam praṇaya sukha karam bhūta bhṛtyai karomi

original: vyavasāyam iti jñātvā tasyātyadbhutakarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: vyavasāyam iti jñātvā tasya ati adbhuta karmaṇaḥ

original: tadviyogābhiśaṅkārtā vicukruśur athāmarāḥ // GoŚv_15 //
analyzed: tad viyoga abhiśaṅkā ārtāḥ vicukruśuḥ atha amarāḥ

original: kṛpālo duḥkhitān asmān parityajya kva yāsyasi /
analyzed: kṛpālaḥ duḥkhitān asmān parityajya kva yāsyasi

original: viṣamasthān iva pitā vatsalo bālaputrakān // GoŚv_16 //
analyzed: viṣama sthān iva pitā vatsalaḥ bāla putrakān

original: saddharmasalilotsekair vardhayan pādapān iva /
analyzed: saddharma salila utsekaiḥ vardhayan pādapān iva

original: asmān anāgasas tyaktvā mā yāsīḥ priyadarśana // GoŚv_17 //
analyzed: asmān anāgasaḥ tyaktvā mā yāsīḥ priya darśana

original: viṣayāsvādacapalair hṛtān indriyavājibhīḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya āsvāda capalaiḥ hṛtān indriya vāji bhīḥ

original: svāmin māsmān parityākṣīḥ prapātāntānucāriṇaḥ // GoŚv_18 //
analyzed: svāmin mā asmān parityākṣīḥ prapāta anta anucāriṇaḥ

original: praṇāmalolānatamaulibandhanān pragāḍhaśokopanipātakātarān /
analyzed: praṇāma lola ānata mauli bandhanān pragāḍha śoka upanipāta kātarān

original: athāmarān aśrupariplutekṣaṇān sa sāntvayann ity avadan marutpatiḥ // GoŚv_19 //
analyzed: athā amarān aśru paripluta īkṣaṇān sa sāntvayan iti avadat marutpatiḥ

original: na me na yuṣmāsv anurāgapeśalaṃ mano na cāyaṃ svahitodayādaraḥ /
analyzed: na me na yuṣmāsu anurāga peśalam manaḥ na ca ayam sva hita udaya ādaraḥ

original: vikāsinīnāṃ vipadāṃ mukhe sthitaṃ jagat paritrātum ayaṃ tu niścayaḥ // GoŚv_20 //
analyzed: vikāsinīnām vipadām mukhe sthitam jagat paritrātum ayam tu niścayaḥ

original: tad apramādaḥ kriyatāṃ sa eva vo dhruvaṃ samārtāyanatām upeṣyati /
analyzed: tat apramādaḥ kriyatām saḥ eva vaḥ dhruvam samārtāyana tām upeṣyati

original: visaṃvadanty eva samāgamāḥ priyair nipātaramyāḥ pariṇāmadāruṇāḥ // GoŚv_21 //
analyzed: visaṃvadanti eva samāgamāḥ priyaiḥ nipāta ramyāḥ pariṇāma dāruṇāḥ

original: sthitvāpi kālam atulaṃ vividhopabhogasaṃbhogavistarasukhais tridaśādhivāse /
analyzed: sthitvā api kālam atulam vividha upabhoga saṃbhoga vistara sukhaiḥ tridaśa adhivāse

original: karmakṣayād vinipatanti surāḥ smarantaḥ saṃvartakānilahatā iva kalpavṛkṣāḥ // GoŚv_22 //
analyzed: karma kṣayāt vinipatanti surāḥ smarantaḥ saṃvartaka anila hatāḥ iva kalpavṛkṣāḥ

original: mandākinīm api vigāhya sahāpsarobhir unnidrahemakamalocchuritopakaṇṭhām /
analyzed: mandākinīm api vigāhya saha apsarobhiḥ unnidra hema kamala ucchurita upakaṇṭhām

original: kṣārodakāṃ jvalanadarbhakukūlakūlāṃ nighnāḥ punar yadi ca vaitaraṇīṃ bhajante // GoŚv_23 //
analyzed: kṣāra udakām jvalana darbha kukūla kūlām nighnāḥ punar yadi ca vaitaraṇīm bhajante

original: ko nāma teṣu matimān svamano nidadhyād utkṣepaṇīyakusumāvayavopameṣu /
analyzed: kaḥ nāma teṣu matimān sva manaḥ nidadhyāt utkṣepaṇīya kusuma avayava upameṣu

original: svargopabhogajaniteṣu sukheṣu yeṣām anteṣv apāyavaḍavāmukhasaṃniveśaḥ // GoŚv_24 //
analyzed: svarga upabhoga janiteṣu sukheṣu yeṣām anteṣu apāya vaḍavāmukha saṃniveśaḥ

original: kalpadrumopavanabhūmiṣu naikaratnaprodbhāsyamānatatatalpaśilātalāsu /
analyzed: kalpadruma upavana bhūmiṣu nā eka ratna prodbhāsyamāna tata talpa śilā talāsu

original: sākaṃ priyābhir anubhūya sukhāni bhūyas tīkṣṇāsipattravanamadhyagatā bhavanti // GoŚv_25 //
analyzed: sākam priyābhiḥ anubhūya sukhāni bhūyas tīkṣṇa asi pattra vana madhya gatāḥ bhavanti

original: saṃbhrāntabālahariṇekṣaṇacañcalāni vibhrāntakālapariṇāmakarāṇi buddheḥ /
analyzed: saṃbhrānta bāla hariṇa īkṣaṇa cañcalāni vibhrānta kāla pariṇāma karāṇi buddheḥ

original: yad dhīndriyārthaparibhogasukhāni tasmād yatnaṃ surāḥ kuruta puṇyaparigrahāya // GoŚv_26 //
analyzed: yat hi indriya artha paribhoga sukhāni tasmāt yatnam surāḥ kuruta puṇya parigrahāya

original: edhobhir agnaya iva praśamaṃ vrajanti kāmāgnayo na viṣayair viṣapānakalpaiḥ /
analyzed: edhobhiḥ agnayaḥ iva praśamam vrajanti kāma agnayaḥ na viṣayaiḥ viṣa pāna kalpaiḥ

original: tasmād upāddhvam anavadyasukhābhirāmāṃ tāthāgatīṃ pratipadaṃ vyasanopaśāntyai // GoŚv_27 //
analyzed: tasmāt upāddhvam anavadya sukha abhirāmām tāthāgatīm pratipadam vyasana upaśāntyai

original: anāthānāṃ dainyaglapitamanasāṃ duḥkhāśīviṣa-
analyzed: anāthānām dainya glapita manasām duḥkha āśīviṣa

original: gaṇopaghrātānāṃ paraśubhir ivotkṛttavapuṣām /
analyzed: gaṇa upaghrātānām paraśubhiḥ iva utkṛtta vapuṣām

original: praśāntyai bhūtānāṃ vayam api tiraścām anukṛtiṃ
analyzed: praśāntyai bhūtānām vayam api tiraścām anukṛtim

original: kariṣyāmo muktvā surabhavanasaṃbhogavasitām // GoŚv_28 //
analyzed: kariṣyāmaḥ muktvā sura bhavana saṃbhoga vasitām

original: avicalapratibandho dīrghakālānuṣaṅgī
mama jagadupakāraprārthanāsaṃniveśaḥ /
analyzed: mama jagat upakāra prārthanā saṃniveśaḥ

original: sucaritaparipākasyeti dṛṣṭvā prasiddhiṃ
analyzed: su carita paripākasya iti dṛṣṭvā prasiddhim

original: na khalu kuśalavighnaṃ kartum arhanti santaḥ // GoŚv_29 //
analyzed: na khalu kuśala vighnam kartum arhanti santaḥ

original: atimānuṣam apy apāsya citraṃ mahimānaṃ kṛpayā vikṛṣyamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: atimānuṣam api apāsya citram mahimānam kṛpayā vikṛṣyamāṇaḥ

original: sa tu duḥkhakaro gatau tiraścāṃ paramāryaḥ pratisaṃdadhe mahātmā // GoŚv_30 //
analyzed: sa tu duḥkha karaḥ gatau tiraścām parama āryaḥ pratisaṃdadhe mahātmā

original: karuṇāmṛtapeśalāśayānāṃ svasukhāsaṅgaviviktamānasānām /
analyzed: karuṇā amṛta peśala āśayānām sva sukha āsaṅga vivikta mānasānām

original: prabhavā iva kalpapādapānām udayā lokahitāya sajjanānām // GoŚv_31 //
analyzed: prabhavāḥ iva kalpapādapānām udayāḥ loka hitāya sat janānām

original: vinayānataratnamauliraśmicchuritās taṃ na marudgaṇapraṇāmāḥ /
analyzed: vinaya ānata ratna mauli raśmi churitāḥ tam na marut gaṇa praṇāmāḥ

original: manujātisukhaṃ samāpatantaṃ sthirasattvaṃ vinivartayāṃ babhūvuḥ // GoŚv_32 //
analyzed: manu jāti sukham samāpatantam sthira sattvam vinivartayām babhūvuḥ

original: virahavyasanopatāpadīnair nayanair bāṣpataraṅgadhūsarāntaiḥ /
analyzed: viraha vyasana upatāpa dīnaiḥ nayanaiḥ bāṣpa taraṅga dhūsara antaiḥ

original: dayitāḥ karuṇaṃ tam īkṣamāṇāḥ śucisattvaṃ na nivartayāṃ babhūvuḥ // GoŚv_33 //
analyzed: dayitāḥ karuṇam tam īkṣamāṇāḥ śuci sattvam na babhūvuḥ

original: svajaneṣu na tasya sānukampaṃ na mano dakṣiṇa eva sa prakṛtyā /
analyzed: sva janeṣu na tasya sa anukampam na manaḥ dakṣiṇaḥ eva sa prakṛtyā

original: avagamya garīyasīṃ tathāpi prakṛtiṃ śvā sa tathā cakāra sādhuḥ // GoŚv_34 //
analyzed: avagamya garīyasīm tathā api prakṛtim śvā sa tathā cakāra sādhuḥ

original: sa hitāvahitā rujāturāṇāṃ himavanmerugurur guruḥ prajānām /
analyzed: sa hita avahitā rujā āturāṇām himavat meru guruḥ guruḥ prajānām

original: puruṣātiśayo guṇaprakarṣān niyataṃ dūrataraṃ samutpapāta // GoŚv_35 //
analyzed: puruṣa atiśayaḥ guṇa prakarṣāt niyatam dūrataram samutpapāta

original: tapobhir yāṃ dīrghair yamaniyamasaṃskāragurubhir
analyzed: tapobhiḥ yām dīrghaiḥ yama niyama saṃskāra gurubhiḥ

original: vyavasyanti prāptuṃ salilaphalamūlānilabhujaḥ /
analyzed: vyavasyanti prāptum salila phala mūla anila bhujaḥ

original: vibhūtiṃ tām aindrīṃ tṛṇam iva parityajya kṛpayā
analyzed: vibhūtim tām aindrīm tṛṇam iva parityajya kṛpayā

original: tiraścāṃ sābhāgyaṃ sa jagadupakārārtham agamat // GoŚv_36 //
analyzed: tiraścām sābhāgyam sa jagat upakāra artham agamat

original: śubhābhyāsād eva kṣapitakukṛtapratyayatayā
analyzed: śubha abhyāsāt eva kṣapita kukṛta pratyaya tayā

original: tathāgatena prāptā bhavagatisamākṣepavaśitā /
analyzed: tathāgatena prāptā bhava gati samākṣepa vaśitā

original: yathecchaṃ yatrecchaṃ parahitasamādhānaviduṣas
analyzed: yatheccham yatreccham para hita samādhāna viduṣaḥ

original: tathā hy abhūt janmavyasanaśamanāyaiva jagatām // GoŚv_37 //
analyzed: tathā hi abhūt janma vyasana śamanāya eva jagatām

original: svakāmakārānuvidhāyinīm śriyam paṭāntalagnām hutabhukśikhām iva /
analyzed: sva kāmakāra anuvidhāyinīm śriyam paṭa anta lagnām hutabhuj śikhām iva

original: na marṣayanti vyasanāturān janān dṛṣṭvā mahāntaḥ karuṇānibandhanāḥ // GoŚv_38 //
analyzed: na marṣayanti vyasana āturān janān dṛṣṭvā mahāntaḥ karuṇā nibandhanāḥ

original: tasyopapattisamakālam athoccacāra lokaṃ sphuran dhvanir iti śravaṇopakārī /
analyzed: tasya upapatti sama kālam atha uccacāra lokam sphuran dhvaniḥ iti śravaṇa upakārī

original: yaḥ pāpy ayaṃ kuru puro bhajanaṃ ca tasya māṃsāsṛjau samupayujya śivaṃ bhajadhvam // GoŚv_39 //
analyzed: yaḥ pāpī ayam kuru puras bhajanam ca tasya māṃsa asṛjau samupayujya śivam bhajadhvam

original: śrutvātha dhvanim atimānuṣaṃ manuṣyāḥ sāṃhatyasvaritam upetya taṃ pradeśam /
analyzed: śrutvā atha dhvanim ati mānuṣam manuṣyāḥ sāṃhatya svaritam upetya tam pradeśam

original: ālokya kṣitidharapīvarātmabhāvaṃ taṃ sādhuṃ kṣamiṇam abhīyur udviṣāṇāḥ // GoŚv_40 //
analyzed: ālokya kṣitidhara pīvara ātma bhāvam tam sādhum kṣamiṇam abhīyuḥ udviṣāṇāḥ

original: āghūrṇasphuṭitakhaḍganiśātapāṇīn dṛṣṭvā tān abhipatato javena gatvā /
analyzed: āghūrṇa sphuṭita khaḍga niśāta pāṇīn dṛṣṭvā tān abhipatataḥ javena gatvā

original: hāheti sphuṭavirasaṃ vilepur uccaiḥ pratyastapraśithilamaulayaḥ suraughāḥ // GoŚv_41 //
analyzed: hāhā iti sphuṭa virasam vilepuḥ uccais pratyasta praśithila maulayaḥ sura oghāḥ

original: māṃ dṛṣṭvā ghanavipulāyatātmabhāvaṃ śrutvā vā surapuravāsināṃ pralāpān /
analyzed: mām dṛṣṭvā ghana vipula āyata ātmabhāvam śrutvā vā sura pura vāsinām pralāpān

original: na kaś cit pratihatamānaso vasāsṛgmoko 'yaṃ kṣaṇam iti so 'bhavad vikārī // GoŚv_42 //
analyzed: na kaḥ cit pratihata mānasaḥ vasa asṛgmokaḥ yam kṣaṇam iti saḥ bhavat vikārī

original: tān paurān suhṛda ivāvalokya tasya prītir yā manasi manasvino jṛmbhate /
analyzed: tān paurān suhṛdaḥ iva avalokya tasya prītiḥ yā manasi manasvinaḥ jṛmbhate

original: tām eva kṣitidharasāradhīḥ sa mene paryāptaṃ phalam atiduṣkarasya tasya // GoŚv_43 //
analyzed: tām eva kṣitidhara sāra dhīḥ sa mene paryāptam phalam ati duṣkarasya tasya

original: lokānām abhilaṣitopakāramyaṃ matvāsāv upacitamāṃsam ātmabhavam /
analyzed: lokānām abhilaṣita upakāramyam matvā asau upacita māṃsam ātma bhavam

original: ekāntavyasananipātalakṣyabhūte saṃsāre 'py abhiratim ābabandha sādhuḥ // GoŚv_44 //
analyzed: ekānta vyasana nipāta lakṣya bhūte saṃsāre pi abhiratim ābabandha sādhuḥ

original: ye dhvastāḥ parahitasaṃvidhānaśūnyās taddehāḥ kṣaṇabhidurā bhavaprabandhe /
analyzed: ye dhvastāḥ para hita saṃvidhāna śūnyāḥ tad dehāḥ kṣaṇa bhidurāḥ bhava prabandhe

original: tān manye sa parigaṇayya śailatuṅgān cchuddhyaiva svatanum upādadhe mahātmā // GoŚv_45 //
analyzed: tān manye sa parigaṇayya śaila tuṅgān śuddhyā eva sva tanum upādadhe mahātmā

original: taṃ matvā vitatavikāram eva dhairyāt te tīkṣṇais tarum iva cicchiduḥ kuṭhāraiḥ /
analyzed: tam matvā vitata vikāram eva dhairyāt te tīkṣṇaiḥ tarum iva cicchiduḥ kuṭhāraiḥ

original: niḥśaṅkā galitakṛpāśivair manobhiḥ so 'py āsīt tarur iva cāpanītamanyuḥ // GoŚv_46 //
analyzed: niḥśaṅkā galita kṛpā śivaiḥ manobhiḥ saḥ pi āsīt taruḥ iva ca apanīta manyuḥ

original: tadraktavyatirekapāṭalāgrahastās tam khaḍgair araya ivāpare vicakruḥ /
analyzed: tad rakta vyatireka pāṭalā agra hastāḥ tam khaḍgaiḥ arayaḥ iva apare vicakruḥ

original: so 'py āsīd abhimatakāryasaṃprasiddhyā prītyaiva sphuṭahṛdayo viśuddhakarmā // GoŚv_47 //
analyzed: saḥ pi āsīt abhimata kārya saṃprasiddhyā prītyā eva sphuṭa hṛdayaḥ viśuddha karmā

original: susrāva kṣatajam athāsya khaḍgadhārāc chedebhyaḥ sphuṭakaradhīrapuṣpatāmram /
analyzed: susrāva kṣatajam atha asya khaḍga dhārāt chedebhyaḥ sphuṭa kara dhīra puṣpa tāmram

original: saṃprāptaghanasamaye vicitrasānor vindhyādrer jalam iva dhātunirjharebhyaḥ // GoŚv_48 //
analyzed: saṃprāpta ghana samaye vicitra sānoḥ vindhya adreḥ jalam iva dhātu nirjharebhyaḥ

original: cakṣāra vraṇamukhakandarebhyo yat tasya kṣatajam iva kṣatāśayasya /
analyzed: cakṣāra vraṇa mukha kandarebhyaḥ yat tasya kṣatajam iva kṣata āśayasya

original: tenohur ghanapariṇāhaphenapuñjā viṣṭabdhā vipulasitavīcayaḥ sravantyaḥ // GoŚv_49 //
analyzed: tena ūhuḥ ghana pariṇāha phena puñjāḥ viṣṭabdhāḥ vipula sita vīcayaḥ sravantyaḥ

original: tat tasya praṇidhibalāvalambinīnām āśānāṃ katham api pūraṇāt sucetaḥ /
analyzed: tat tasya praṇidhi bala avalambinīnām āśānām katham api pūraṇāt su cetaḥ

original: saṃprāpte 'py amrapure śarīrabhedāt prāmodyaṃ niratiśayopamaṃ babhāra // GoŚv_50 //
analyzed: saṃprāpte pi amra pure śarīrabhedāt prāmodyam niratiśaya upamam babhāra

original: dadhvāna prapatadasṛkkadeharandhre vicchinne paraśutīkṣṇadhārayāsya /
analyzed: dadhvāna prapatat asṛkka deha randhre vicchinne paraśu tīkṣṇa dhārayā asya

original: pratyantajvalanaśikhāvalīḍhasānoḥ kuñjeṣu drutam iva kāncanaṃ sumeroḥ // GoŚv_51 //
analyzed: pratyanta jvalana śikhā avalīḍha sānoḥ kuñjeṣu drutam iva kāncanam sumeroḥ

original: tasyograir yugapad itas tataś ca śastrair niḥśaṅkaṃ śakalitakomalāśrayāṅge /
analyzed: tasya ugraiḥ yugapad itas tatas ca śastraiḥ niḥśaṅkam śakalita komala āśraya aṅge

original: vicchinne sahananiviṣṭaśuddhabuddheḥ prītyārdre manasi tirodadhe viṣādaḥ // GoŚv_52 //
analyzed: vicchinne sahana niviṣṭa śuddha buddheḥ prīti ārdre manasi tirodadhe viṣādaḥ

original: paricayakṛtamārgās tasya raktapraṇālyo gagaṇaparikhabhūte cchidyamāne śarīre /
analyzed: paricaya kṛta mārgāḥ tasya rakta praṇālyaḥ gagaṇa parikha bhūte chidyamāne śarīre

original: kṣitidharasaridoghā vistarāṇi pracakrur na ca manasi viṣādo nāpi khedo babhūva // GoŚv_53 //
analyzed: kṣitidhara sarit oghāḥ vistarāṇi pracakruḥ na ca manasi viṣādaḥ nā api khedaḥ babhūva

original: apacitataramāṃsāsṛgvasākardamāsu vyapagatabhayaśaṅkās tasya vistāriṇīṣu /
analyzed: apacitatara māṃsa asṛj vasā kardamāsu vyapagata bhaya śaṅkāḥ tasya vistāriṇīṣu

original: tanuvivaratareṣu vyāḍasaṃghā vicerur na ca manasi viṣādo na ca khedo babhūva // GoŚv_54 //
analyzed: tanu vivaratareṣu vyāḍa saṃghāḥ viceruḥ na ca manasi viṣādaḥ na ca khedaḥ babhūva

original: yad apahṛtam anāryais tasya māṃsaṃ śarīrād yadi tad apariśeṣaṃ piṇḍitaṃ syāt kathaṃ cit /
analyzed: yat apahṛtam anāryaiḥ tasya māṃsam śarīrāt yadi tat a pariśeṣam piṇḍitam syāt katham cit

original: girim api sa sumeruṃ laṅghayen māṃsarāśir na ca manasi viṣado na ca khedo babhūva // GoŚv_55 //
analyzed: girim api sa sumerum laṅghayet māṃsa rāśiḥ na ca manasi viṣadaḥ na ca khedaḥ babhūva

original: kṣayam upayayur aṅgeṣv eva śastrāṇi tasya prakṛtimṛduṣu sādhor akṣatādhyāśayasya /
analyzed: kṣayam upayayuḥ aṅgeṣu eva śastrāṇi tasya prakṛti mṛduṣu sādhoḥ akṣata adhyāśayasya

original: abhirucitaparārthaprītisaṃbhogaśānte na ca manasi viṣādo na ca khedo babhūva // GoŚv_56 //
analyzed: abhirucita para artha prīti saṃbhoga śānte na ca manasi viṣādaḥ na ca khedaḥ babhūva

original: ye cāsya raktair vililepur aṅgā te rejire rogaviṣādamuktāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca asya raktaiḥ vililepuḥ aṅgā te rejire roga viṣāda muktāḥ

original: ye cāpi raktāni papuḥ sarogās te sarvalokāḥ pupuṣur virogāḥ // GoŚv_57 //
analyzed: ye ca api raktāni papuḥ sa rogāḥ te sarva lokāḥ pupuṣuḥ virogāḥ

original: janam apagatarogaṃ vīkṣamāṇasya harṣo manasi bhuvanabandhor labdhagādho babhūva /
analyzed: janam apagata rogam vīkṣamāṇasya harṣaḥ manasi bhuvana bandhoḥ labdha gādhaḥ babhūva

original: piśitam anupayogaṃ vīkṣamāṇasya bhūyo 'py abhavad aratidolaṃ cañcalaṃ tasya cetaḥ // GoŚv_58 //
analyzed: piśitam an upayogam vīkṣamāṇasya bhūyas pi abhavat arati dolam cañcalam tasya cetaḥ

original: utkṛttacarmapaṭalasphuṭatāmramāṃso randhrodvamadrudhiraśeṣaviśeṣatāmraḥ /
analyzed: utkṛtta carma paṭala sphuṭa tāmra māṃsaḥ randhra udvamat rudhira śeṣa viśeṣa tāmraḥ

original: kāyaḥ sa tasya vikṛtaḥ kṛtaniścayasya reje javākusumarāśir ivābhracumbī // GoŚv_59 //
analyzed: kāyaḥ sa tasya vikṛtaḥ kṛta niścayasya reje javā kusuma rāśiḥ iva abhra cumbī

original: vicchidyamānaḥ suniśātaśastrais tad duḥkham ekāśrayam īkṣamāṇaḥ /
analyzed: vicchidyamānaḥ su niśāta śastraiḥ tat duḥkham eka āśrayam īkṣamāṇaḥ

original: sukhena duḥkhaṃ sa nirācakāra labdhvā paratrātmani caikamatyam // GoŚv_60 //
analyzed: sukhena duḥkham sa nirācakāra labdhvā paratra ātmani ca aikamatyam

original: pariṇāmakharā batādhamāyā gatir ātmābhiniveśavāsanāyāḥ /
analyzed: pariṇāma kharā bata adhamāyāḥ gatiḥ ātma abhiniveśa vāsanāyāḥ

original: upadigdhadhiyo yayā manuṣyāḥ pitṛbhūteṣv api sādhuṣu skhalanti // GoŚv_61 //
analyzed: upadigdha dhiyaḥ yayā manuṣyāḥ pitṛ bhūteṣu api sādhuṣu skhalanti

original: etasya māṃsaṃ bubhuje kṛpālor yo yaḥ sa sa vyādhim apācakāra /
analyzed: etasya māṃsam bubhuje kṛpāloḥ yaḥ yaḥ sa sa vyādhim apācakāra

original: krameṇa kṛcchraṃ jagad uttatāra vipatsamudraṃ tad anena kṛtsnam // GoŚv_62 //
analyzed: krameṇa kṛcchram jagat uttatāra vipad samudram tat anena kṛtsnam

original: atha sarva eva loko vigatanikhilarogopasargas tasmin mahāsattve samupajātapremagauravabahumānaḥ praṇamya śvānaṃ bodhisattvam abravīt //
analyzed: atha sarvaḥ eva lokaḥ vigata nikhila roga upasargaḥ tasmin mahāsattve samupajāta prema gaurava bahu mānaḥ praṇamya śvānam bodhisattvam abravīt

original: aho kṛpābhyāsaviśeṣabhadratā guṇeṣv aho bhaktir apetakalmaṣā /
analyzed: aho kṛpā abhyāsa viśeṣa bhadra tā guṇeṣu aho bhaktiḥ apeta kalmaṣā

original: aho parārthapratipattipeśalaṃ tavārya karmedam atītamānuṣam // GoŚv_63 //
analyzed: aho parārtha pratipatti peśalam tava ārya karma idam atīta mānuṣam

original: aho jagacchreṣṭhamahādayārdratā aho svasaukhyavyavasāyaniḥspṛhā /
analyzed: aho jagat śreṣṭha mahā dayā ārdra tā aho sva saukhya vyavasāya niḥspṛhā

original: śubheṣv aho niścayaniścalaṃ mano manasvināṃ bodhipathānupātinām // GoŚv_64 //
analyzed: śubheṣu aho niścaya niścalam manaḥ manasvinām bodhi patha anupātinām

original: aho batācintyam upāyakauśalam aho parārthe 'bhirater udāttatā /
analyzed: aho bata acintyam upāya kauśalam aho para arthe bhirateḥ udātta tā

original: acintyacaryātiśayāya sādhave namo 'stu tubhyaṃ jagadekabandhave // GoŚv_65 //
analyzed: acintya caryā atiśayāya sādhave namaḥ stu tubhyam jagat ekabandhave

original: tvaṃ naḥ pitā yadi pitā tvam ivārthakāmaḥ śāstā tvam eva yadi dharmagurus tvam eva /
analyzed: tvam naḥ pitā yadi pitā tvam iva artha kāmaḥ śāstā tvam eva yadi dharma guruḥ tvam eva

original: tvam daivataṃ yadi na taj janavādamātram ārtāyanaṃ tu jagataḥ paramaṃ tvam eva // GoŚv_66 //
analyzed: tvam daivatam yadi na tat janavāda mātram ārtāyanam tu jagataḥ paramam tvam eva

original: tasmād ājñābhiṣekeṇa pavitrayitum arhasi /
analyzed: tasmāt ājñā abhiṣekeṇa pavitrayitum arhasi

original: upadigdham imaṃ lokaṃ yuṣmadāyāsacetasā // GoŚv_67 //
analyzed: upadigdham imam lokam yuṣmad āyāsa cetasā

original: atha bodhisattvaḥ samupajātaprasādamānasam avagamya tam enam abravīt //
analyzed: atha bodhisattvaḥ samupajāta prasāda mānasam avagamya tam enam abravīt

original: pīḍā mameyam iti naivam idaṃ pradhāryaṃ sattvārtham eva gaticakracalasya nityam /
analyzed: pīḍā mama iyam iti nā evam idam pradhāryam sattva artham eva gati cakra calasya nityam

original: pīḍā mamābhavad udīkṣya vipatparītān yuṣmān nirāmayasukhaṃ tv adhunā mano me // GoŚv_68 //
analyzed: pīḍā mama abhavat udīkṣya vipad parītān yuṣmān nirāmaya sukham tu adhunā manaḥ me

original: kṛtyaṃ na me parahitād aparaṃ garīyaḥ saṃsāracārakanibandhanam etad eva /
analyzed: kṛtyam na me para hitāt aparam garīyaḥ saṃsāra cāraka nibandhanam etat eva

original: tasmāt kukāryamalinām atilaṅghya caryāṃ matprītaye satatam ātmahitaṃ kurudhvam // GoŚv_69 //
analyzed: tasmāt kukārya malinām a tilaṅghya caryām mad prītaye satatam ātma hitam kurudhvam

original: lokān imān svakṛtakarmabhujo viditvā mṛtyor aparvaparuṣasya karodarasthān /
analyzed: lokān imān sva kṛta karma bhujaḥ viditvā mṛtyoḥ aparva paruṣasya kara udara sthān

original: pāpāny asahyaparitāpaphalodayāni prāṇātyaye 'pi parivarjayituṃ yatadhvam // GoŚv_70 //
analyzed: pāpāni asahya paritāpa phala udayāni prāṇātyaye pi parivarjayitum yatadhvam

original: svantāny anāśaramaṇīyaphalapradāni janmāṭavīgahanapathyadanopamāni /
analyzed: su antāni anāśa ramaṇīya phala pradāni janma aṭavī gahana pathi adana upamāni

original: puṇyāni saṃcinuta matpratikārabuddhyā kalyāṇamitravacanaṃ hi na laṅghanīyam // GoŚv_71 //
analyzed: puṇyāni saṃcinuta mad pratikāra buddhyā kalyāṇa mitra vacanam hi na laṅghanīyam

original: iti samanuśiṣya prāṇinas tān mahātmā niśitaparaśudhārājarjaraklāntadehaḥ /
analyzed: iti samanuśiṣya prāṇinaḥ tān mahātmā niśita paraśu dhārā jarjara klānta dehaḥ

original: avasitakaraṇīyaḥ paryudasyātmabhāvaṃ tam ativikṛtarūpaṃ svargam evāruroha // GoŚv_72 //
analyzed: avasita karaṇīyaḥ paryudasya ātma bhāvam tam ati vikṛta rūpam svargam eva āruroha

original: iti jagadupajīvyā uttamaśrīsamudrā vipadaśaninipātavyāhatā vyuṣṭiyogāt /
analyzed: iti jagat upajīvyāḥ uttama śrī samudrāḥ vipad aśani nipāta vyāhatāḥ vyuṣṭi yogāt

original: vigatajaladapaṅkavyomaparyantadīrghāḥ śaśina iva mayūkhā lokam uttārayanti // GoŚv_73 //
analyzed: vigata jalada paṅka vyoma paryanta dīrghāḥ śaśinaḥ iva mayūkhāḥ lokam uttārayanti

original: // iti śrījātakamālāyāṃ śvajātakaṃ tricatvāriṃśattamaṃ samāptam //
analyzed: iti śrī jātaka mālāyām śva jātakam tricatvāriṃśattamam samāptam
